title: Herbal Energy Tea — Shilajit + Tulsi Blend
excerpt: An energizing, adaptogenic tea combining tulsi, ginger, cinnamon and a small, pharmaceutically-purified inclusion of shilajit for stamina and recovery.
content:
## What Is This Herbal Energy Tea?
A warming, adaptogenic tea thoughtfully blended to support gentle energy and recovery. The base of tulsi (holy basil), ginger, and cinnamon is enhanced with a small, pharmaceutically-purified shilajit inclusion—clearly sourced and disclosed on the pack.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Tulsi is adaptogenic and supports respiratory and mental clarity; ginger stimulates digestion and circulation; shilajit (used sparingly and only when purified) is a classical rejuvenative mineral resin used to support stamina and recovery.

### Key Benefits
- Supports stamina and recovery when used responsibly.
- Mild adaptogenic support for stress resilience.
- Stimulates digestion and circulation with warming spices.

## Ingredients
- Tulsi (organic)
- Ginger
- Cinnamon
- Pharmaceutical-grade purified shilajit (very small inclusion)

## Usage Instructions
- Brew one tea sachet in hot water for 4–6 minutes. Consume 1 cup/day.
- Avoid excessive intake; follow pack dosing.

## Packaging
- Tea sachets with clear shilajit sourcing and purity statement on the box.

## Safety & Consultation
- Shilajit is included only as a pharmaceutically purified extract in very small amounts; consult your healthcare practitioner before use if pregnant, breastfeeding, on medication, or if you have gout, hemochromatosis, or hormone-sensitive conditions. Discontinue if you notice adverse effects.

## Why Choose This Tea?
A modern, cautious formulation that brings traditional adaptogens into a convenient tea with clear sourcing and safety guidance.
